name: Sylvie's Bananas Foster
description: Sylvie’s rendition of her favourite New Orleans dessert. So easy and yummy – perfect when you need to come up with a quick dessert with only a few bananas and what’s in the pantry.

ingredients.name: bananas
ingredients.additionalInstruction: each peeled and sliced lengthwise, then in half

preparation: In a large frying pan, melt butter over medium heat.
Stir in sugar, rum, vanilla extract, and Cinnamon. When mixture begins to bubble, place bananas and walnuts in pan. Cook for 1-2 minutes, until bananas are hot.
Serve immediately over vanilla ice cream.
